ModMetaData.name: [RH2] CPERS: Arrest Here!
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker, Taranchuk
ModMetaData.description:
Save precious time and arrest a downed prisoner without the need of a room!
"Arrest here" allows you to turn downed pawns into prisoners without having to quickly build a prison during raids or defense where a prison room isn't readily available.
The following mod adds: - Ability to arrest a downed pawn without prison room
What is CPERS? Captured Persons or prisoners are types of protected persons covered by the law of armed conflict (LOAC). "CPERS" is the abbreviated short term for these individuals.
What does "Arrest Here!" do? You can arrest a prisoner without the need of a prison room.
What is the difference between this mod and "Imprisonment on the go!"? - 3 second delay until arrest is performed successfully, rather than instantly - zip tie sound effect played, rather than chains clinking - Says "Arrest Here", rather than "Imprison (name of pawn)" - Presentation and art style
Combat Extended Compatible? Unknown
Credits: Chicken Plucker Taranchuk - C# AgentBlanc - Author of "Imprisonment on the go!"
